commentBody: The media is not responsible for Donald Trump. He made himself the news, and the press would be irresponsible if it did not report about this dangerous man being supported by so many delusional voters in this country. The media is not perfect but it cannot, and should not report only about those they support. It is the news. Opinion pieces can and do express disgust with the manchild called Trump. Stop ranting about the media, and convince our fellow citizens that he cannot be permitted to succeed. We, the people ....
